data.title: About Me
data.sub_title: I create apps that are part of your daily life
data.description:
I am a mechatronics engineer and software developer, with a clear focus on responsibility and results orientation. I have over 7 years of experience in the sector, 6 of which have been strongly focused on mobile development with Flutter.

Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to participate in projects across various industries. I am comfortable taking on leadership roles to guide teams and ensure project success.

One of my greatest strengths is my flexibility and adaptability in the face of new technological challenges. I constantly seek to share my knowledge and collaborate closely with both colleagues and clients, ensuring that we jointly achieve all the planned objectives.
